whyJoinUs.title: Why Choose RapidBizz?
whyJoinUs.description: We offer more than just a job - we provide a platform for growth, learning, and meaningful contribution.

benefits.description: Course reimbursements, conference attendance, and internal training programs.

benefits.title: Health & Wellness
benefits.description: Comprehensive health coverage and gym/wellness reimbursements.

benefits.title: Career Growth
benefits.description: Clear advancement paths with mentorship from senior professionals.

benefits.title: Innovation Focus
benefits.description: Work with cutting-edge technologies on challenging and meaningful projects.

openPositions.title: Current Openings
openPositions.description: Explore our current job opportunities and find the perfect role for your skills and aspirations.
openPositions.noPositions: We don't have any open positions at the moment, but we're always interested in connecting with talented professionals.
openPositions.applyAnyway: Send us your resume and we'll reach out when a suitable position becomes available.

applicationProcess.title: Application Process
applicationProcess.description: Our hiring process is designed to be thorough yet respectful of your time.

steps.title: Application Review
steps.description: We review your application and resume to assess fit for the role.

steps.title: Initial Screening
steps.description: A brief phone or video call to discuss your background and interest.

steps.title: Technical Assessment
steps.description: A practical assessment relevant to the role (coding, design, etc.).

steps.title: Team Interview
steps.description: Meet with team members and discuss collaboration and culture fit.

steps.title: Final Interview
steps.description: Discussion with leadership about your goals and our mutual fit.

steps.title: Offer & Onboarding
steps.description: We present an offer and begin the onboarding process.

benefits.title: Employee Benefits
benefits.description: We believe in taking care of our team members with comprehensive benefits and perks.

testimonials.title: What Our Team Says
testimonials.description: Hear from our current team members about their experience working at RapidBizz.

cta.title: Ready to Join Us?
